original: Majjhima Nikāya 24
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Rathavinītasutta
analyzed: rathavinītasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Atha kho sambahulā jātibhūmakā bhikkhū jātibhūmiyaṁ vassaṁvuṭṭhā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ jātibhūmakāḥ bhikkhū jāti bhūmiyam vassa vuṭṭhāḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinne kho

original: te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: te bhikkhū bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Ko nu kho, bhikkhave, jātibhūmiyaṁ jātibhūmakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ evaṁ sambhāvito:
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bhikkhave jāti bhūmiyam jāti bhūmakānam bhikkhūnam sabrahmacārīnam evam sambhāvitaḥ

original: ‘attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca santuṭṭho santuṭṭhikathañca
analyzed: attanā ca appicchaḥ appiccha katham ca bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca santuṭṭho santuṭṭhi katham ca

original: bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca pavivitto pavivekakathañca bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca
analyzed: bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca pavivittaḥ paviveka katham ca bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca

original: asaṁsaṭṭho asaṁsaggakathañca bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca āraddhavīriyo vīriyārambhakathañca
analyzed: a sasaṭṭhaḥ a sasagga katham ca bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca āraddha vīriyaḥ vīriya ārambha katham ca

original: bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca sīlasampanno sīlasampadākathañca bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā
analyzed: bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca sīla sampannaḥ sīla sampadā katham ca bhikkhūnam kattā attanā

original: ca samādhisampanno samādhisampadākathañca bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca paññāsampanno
analyzed: ca samādhi sampanno samādhi sampadā katham ca bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca paññā sampanno

original: paññāsampadākathañca bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca vimuttisampanno vimuttisampadākathañca
analyzed: paññā sampadā katham ca bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca vimutti sampannaḥ vimutti sampadā katham ca

original: bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadākathañca
analyzed: bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca vimutti ñāṇa dassana sampannaḥ vimutti ñāṇa dassana sampadā kathañca

original: bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, ovādako viññāpako sandassako samādapako samuttejako sampahaṁsako
analyzed: bhikkhūnam kattā ovādakaḥ viññāpakaḥ sandassakaḥ samādapakaḥ samuttejakaḥ sampahasakaḥ

original: sabrahmacārīnan’”ti?
analyzed: sabrahmacārīn anti

original: “Puṇṇo nāma, bhante, āyasmā mantāṇiputto jātibhūmiyaṁ jātibhūmakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ evaṁ sambhāvito:
analyzed: puṇṇaḥ nāma bhante āyasmā mantāṇiputto jāti bhūmiyam jāti bhūmakānam bhikkhūnam sabrahmacārīnam evam sambhāvitaḥ

original: ‘attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca bhikkhūnaṁ kattā, attanā ca santuṭṭho …pe… ovādako viññāpako sandassako samādapako samuttejako sampahaṁsako sabrahmacārīnan’”ti.
analyzed: attanā ca appicchaḥ appiccha katham ca bhikkhūnam kattā attanā ca santuṭṭho pe ovādakaḥ viññāpakaḥ sandassako samādapakaḥ samuttejakaḥ sampahasakaḥ

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhagavataḥ avidūre nisinnaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ sāriputtassa etat ahosi

original: “lābhā āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa, suladdhalābhā āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa,
analyzed: lābhāḥ āyasmataḥ puṇṇassa mantāṇi puttassa su laddha lābhāḥ āyasmataḥ puṇṇassa mantāṇi puttassa

original: yassa viññū sabrahmacārī satthu sammukhā anumassa anumassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsanti, tañca satthā abbhanumodati.
analyzed: yassa viññū sabrahmacārī satthu sammukhāḥ anumassa anumassa vaṇṇam bhāsanti tat ca satthā abbhanumodati

original: Appeva nāma mayampi kadāci karahaci āyasmatā puṇṇena mantāṇiputtena saddhiṁ samāgaccheyyāma, appeva nāma siyā kocideva kathāsallāpo”ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma mayam pi kadāci karahaci āyasmatā puṇṇena mantāṇi puttena saddhim samāgaccheyyāma appā iva nāma siyā kaścid eva kathā sallāpā uti

original: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantam viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena sāvatthi tat avasari

original: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tatra sudam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Assosi kho āyasmā puṇṇo mantāṇiputto: “bhagavā kira sāvatthiṁ anuppatto; sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti.
analyzed: assosi kho āyasmā puṇṇaḥ mantāṇi putto bhagavā kira sāvatthim an uppattaḥ sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo mantāṇiputto senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā puṇṇaḥ mantāṇi putto senāsanam sasāmetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena sāvatthi jetavanam anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ puṇṇaṁ mantāṇiputtaṁ bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam kho āyasmantam puṇṇam mantāṇi puttam bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi

original: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo mantāṇiputto bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā puṇṇaḥ mantāṇi puttaḥ bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ

original: samuttejito sampahaṁsito bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantaḥ

original: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena andhavanaṁ tenupasaṅkami divāvihārāya.
analyzed: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā yena andhavanam tena upasaṅkami divāvihārāya

original: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho aññataraḥ bhikkhu yena āyasmā sāriputto tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam sāriputtam etat avoca

original: “yassa kho tvaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, puṇṇassa nāma bhikkhuno mantāṇiputtassa abhiṇhaṁ
analyzed: yassa kho tvam āvuso sāriputta puṇṇassa nāma bhikkhuno mantāṇi puttassa abhiṇha

original: kittayamāno ahosi, so bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito
analyzed: kittayamānaḥ ahosi saḥ bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ

original: sampahaṁsito bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā
analyzed: sampahasitaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā

original: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena andhavanaṁ tena pakkanto divāvihārāyā”ti.
analyzed: padakkhiṇam katvā yena andhavanam tena pakkantaḥ divāvihārāya āti

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto taramānarūpo nisīdanaṁ ādāya āyasmantaṁ puṇṇaṁ mantāṇiputtaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi sīsānulokī.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ taramāna rūpaḥ nisīdanam ādāya āyasmantam puṇṇam mantāṇi puttam piṭṭhitaḥ piṭṭhitaḥ anubandhi sīsa anulokī

original: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo mantāṇiputto andhavanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā puṇṇaḥ mantāṇi putto andhavanam ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmim rukkha mūle divāvihāram nisīdi

original: Āyasmāpi kho sāriputto andhavanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: āyasmā api kho sāriputtaḥ andhavanam ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmim rukkha mūle divāvihāram nisīdi

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā puṇṇo mantāṇiputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā puṇṇena mantāṇiputtena saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena āyasmā puṇṇaḥ mantāṇi putto tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā puṇṇena mantāṇi puttena saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ puṇṇaṁ mantāṇiputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam puṇṇam mantāṇi puttam etat avoca

original: “Bhagavati no, āvuso, brahmacariyaṁ vussatī”ti?
analyzed: bhagavati no āvuso brahmacariyam vussati iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti.
analyzed: evam āvuso iti

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, sīlavisuddhatthaṁ bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho āvuso sīla visuddha attham bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati iti

original: “No hidaṁ, āvuso”.
analyzed: na u hide āvuso

original: “Kiṁ panāvuso, cittavisuddhatthaṁ bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana āvuso citta visuddha attham bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati iti

original: “No hidaṁ, āvuso”.
analyzed: na u hide āvuso

original: “‘Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, sīlavisuddhatthaṁ bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘no hidaṁ, āvuso’ti vadesi.

original: Cittavisuddhiñce, āvuso, bhagavā anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya, saupādānaṁyeva samānaṁ anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya.
analyzed: citta visuddhim ce āvuso bhagavā anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya sa aupādānayā iva samānam anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya

original: Diṭṭhivisuddhiñce, āvuso, bhagavā anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya, saupādānaṁyeva samānaṁ anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya.
analyzed: diṭṭhi visuddhim ce āvuso bhagavā anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya sa aupādānayā iva samānam anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya

original: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiñce, āvuso, bhagavā anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya, saupādānaṁyeva samānaṁ anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya.
analyzed: kaṅkhā vitaraṇa visuddhim ce āvuso bhagavā anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya sa aupādānayā iva samānam anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya

original: Maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiñce, āvuso, bhagavā anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya, saupādānaṁyeva samānaṁ anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya.
analyzed: magga amagga ñāṇa dassana visuddhim ce āvuso bhagavā anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya sa aupādānayā iva samānam anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya

original: Paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiñce, āvuso, bhagavā anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya, saupādānaṁyeva samānaṁ anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya.
analyzed: paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhim ce āvuso bhagavā anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya sa aupādānayā iva samānam anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya

original: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhiñce, āvuso, bhagavā anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya, saupādānaṁyeva samānaṁ anupādāparinibbānaṁ paññapeyya.
analyzed: ñāṇa dassana visuddhim ce āvuso bhagavā anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya sa aupādānayā iva samānam anupādā parinibbānam paññapeyya

original: Aññatra ce, āvuso, imehi dhammehi anupādāparinibbānaṁ abhavissa, puthujjano parinibbāyeyya.
analyzed: aññatra ce āvuso imehi dhammehi an upādā parinibbānam abhavissa puthujjanaḥ parinibbāyeyya

original: Puthujjano hi, āvuso, aññatra imehi dhammehi.
analyzed: puthujjanaḥ hi āvuso aññatra imehi dhammehi

original: Tena hāvuso, upamaṁ te karissāmi;
analyzed: tena ha āvuso upamam te karissāmi

original: upamāyapidhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājānanti.
analyzed: viññū purisāḥ bhāsitassa attham ājānanti

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rañño pasenadissa kosalassa sāvatthiyaṁ paṭivasantassa sākete kiñcideva accāyikaṁ karaṇīyaṁ uppajjeyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso raññaḥ pasenadissa kosalassa sāvatthiyam paṭivasantassa sākete kiñcid eva accāyikam karaṇīyam uppajjeyya

original: Tassa antarā ca sāvatthiṁ antarā ca sāketaṁ satta rathavinītāni upaṭṭhapeyyuṁ.
analyzed: tassa antarā ca sāvatthim antarā ca sāketam satta ratha vinītāni upaṭṭhapeyyu

original: Atha kho, āvuso, rājā pasenadi kosalo sāvatthiyā nikkhamitvā antepuradvārā paṭhamaṁ
analyzed: atha kho āvuso rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ sāvatthiyā nikkhamitvā antepura dvārā

original: rathavinītaṁ abhiruheyya, paṭhamena rathavinītena dutiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇeyya,
analyzed: ratha vinītam abhiruheyya paṭhamena ratha vinītena dutiyam ratha vinītam pāpuṇeyya

original: paṭhamaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjeyya dutiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruheyya.
analyzed: paṭhamam ratha vinītam vissajjeyya dutiyam ratha vinītam abhiruheyya

original: Dutiyena rathavinītena tatiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇeyya, dutiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjeyya, tatiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruheyya.
analyzed: dutiyena ratha vinītena tatiyam ratha vinītam pāpuṇeyya dutiyam ratha vinītam vissajjeyya tatiyam ratha vinītam abhiruheyya

original: Tatiyena rathavinītena catutthaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇeyya, tatiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjeyya, catutthaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruheyya.
analyzed: tatiyena ratha vinītena catuttham ratha vinītam pāpuṇeyya tatiyam ratha vinītam vissajjeyya catuttham ratha vinītam abhiruheyya

original: Catutthena rathavinītena pañcamaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇeyya, catutthaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjeyya, pañcamaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruheyya.
analyzed: catutthena ratha vinītena pañcamam ratha vinītam pāpuṇeyya catuttham ratha vinītam vissajjeyya pañcamam ratha vinītam abhiruheyya

original: Pañcamena rathavinītena chaṭṭhaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇeyya, pañcamaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjeyya, chaṭṭhaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruheyya.
analyzed: pañcamena ratha vinītena chaṭṭham ratha vinītam pāpuṇeyya pañcamam ratha vinītam vissajjeyya chaṭṭham ratha vinītam abhiruheyya

original: Chaṭṭhena rathavinītena sattamaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇeyya, chaṭṭhaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjeyya, sattamaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruheyya.
analyzed: chaṭṭhena ratha vinītena sattamam ratha vinītam pāpuṇeyya chaṭṭham ratha vinītam vissajjeyya sattamam ratha vinītam abhiruheyya

original: Sattamena rathavinītena sāketaṁ anupāpuṇeyya antepuradvāraṁ.
analyzed: sattamena ratha vinītena sāketam anupāpuṇeyya antepura dvāra

original: Tamenaṁ antepuradvāragataṁ samānaṁ mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
analyzed: tam enam antepura dvāra gatam samānam mitta amaccāḥ ñāti sālohitāḥ evam puccheyyuḥ

original: ‘iminā tvaṁ, mahārāja, rathavinītena sāvatthiyā sāketaṁ anuppatto antepuradvāran’ti?
analyzed: iminā tva mahā rāja ratha vinītena sāvatthiyā sāketam an uppattaḥ antepura dvāra nti

original: Kathaṁ byākaramāno nu kho, āvuso, rājā pasenadi kosalo sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti?
analyzed: katham byākaramānaḥ nu khalu āvuso rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya ati

original: “Evaṁ byākaramāno kho, āvuso, rājā pasenadi kosalo sammā byākaramāno byākareyya:
analyzed: evam byākaramānaḥ kho āvuso rājā pasenadi kosalo sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya

original: ‘idha me sāvatthiyaṁ paṭivasantassa sākete kiñcideva accāyikaṁ karaṇīyaṁ uppajji.
analyzed: idha me sāvatthiyam paṭivasantassa sākete kiñcid eva accāyikam karaṇīyam uppajji

original: Tassa me antarā ca sāvatthiṁ antarā ca sāketaṁ satta rathavinītāni upaṭṭhapesuṁ.
analyzed: tassa me antarā ca sāvatthim antarā ca sāketam satta ratha vinītāni upaṭṭhapesu

original: Atha khvāhaṁ sāvatthiyā nikkhamitvā antepuradvārā paṭhamaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruhiṁ.
analyzed: atha khvā aham sāvatthiyāḥ nikkhamitvā antepura dvārā paṭhamam ratha vinītam abhiruhi

original: Paṭhamena rathavinītena dutiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇiṁ, paṭhamaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjiṁ dutiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruhiṁ.
analyzed: paṭhamena ratha vinītena dutiyam ratha vinītam pāpuṇi paṭhamam ratha vinītam vissajjim dutiyam ratha vinītam abhiruhi

original: Dutiyena rathavinītena tatiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇiṁ, dutiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjiṁ, tatiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruhiṁ.
analyzed: dutiyena ratha vinītena tatiyam ratha vinītam pāpuṇi dutiyam ratha vinītam vissajji tatiyam ratha vinītam abhiruhi

original: Tatiyena rathavinītena catutthaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇiṁ, tatiyaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjiṁ, catutthaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruhiṁ.
analyzed: tatiyena ratha vinītena catuttham ratha vinītam pāpuṇi tatiyam ratha vinītam vissajji catuttham ratha vinītam abhiruhi

original: Catutthena rathavinītena pañcamaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇiṁ, catutthaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjiṁ, pañcamaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruhiṁ.
analyzed: catutthena ratha vinītena pañcamam ratha vinītam pāpuṇi catuttham ratha vinītam vissajji pañcamam ratha vinītam abhiruhi

original: Pañcamena rathavinītena chaṭṭhaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇiṁ, pañcamaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjiṁ, chaṭṭhaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruhiṁ.
analyzed: pañcamena ratha vinītena chaṭṭham ratha vinītam pāpuṇi pañcamam ratha vinītam vissajji chaṭṭham ratha vinītam abhiruhi

original: Chaṭṭhena rathavinītena sattamaṁ rathavinītaṁ pāpuṇiṁ, chaṭṭhaṁ rathavinītaṁ vissajjiṁ, sattamaṁ rathavinītaṁ abhiruhiṁ.
analyzed: chaṭṭhena ratha vinītena sattamam ratha vinītam pāpuṇi chaṭṭham ratha vinītam vissajji sattamam ratha vinītam abhiruhi

original: Sattamena rathavinītena sāketaṁ anuppatto antepuradvāran’ti.
analyzed: sattamena ratha vinītena sāketam an uppattaḥ antepura dvāra nti

original: Evaṁ byākaramāno kho, āvuso, rājā pasenadi kosalo sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
analyzed: evam byākaramānaḥ kho āvuso rājā pasenadi kosalo sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya ati

original: “Evameva kho, āvuso, sīlavisuddhi yāvadeva cittavisuddhatthā, cittavisuddhi yāvadeva
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso sīla visuddhi yāvat eva citta visuddhatthā citta visuddhi yāvat eva

original: diṭṭhivisuddhatthā, diṭṭhivisuddhi yāvadeva kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhatthā, kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi
analyzed: diṭṭhi visuddhatthā diṭṭhi visuddhi yāvat eva kaṅkhā vitaraṇa visuddhatthā kaṅkhā vitaraṇa visuddhi

original: yāvadeva maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhatthā, maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi yāvadeva
analyzed: yāvat eva maggāmagga ñāṇa dassana visuddhatthā maggāmagga ñāṇa dassana visuddhi yāvat eva

original: paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhatthā, paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi yāvadeva ñāṇadassanavisuddhatthā,
analyzed: paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhatthā paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhi yāvat eva ñāṇa dassana visuddhatthā

original: ñāṇadassanavisuddhi yāvadeva anupādāparinibbānatthā.
Anupādāparinibbānatthaṁ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī”ti.
analyzed: an upādā parinibbāna attham kho āvuso bhagavati brahmacariyam vussati iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ puṇṇaṁ mantāṇiputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam puṇṇam mantāṇi puttam etat avoca

original: “konāmo āyasmā, kathañca panāyasmantaṁ sabrahmacārī jānantī”ti?
analyzed: āyasmā kathañca pana āyasmantam sabrahmacārī jānanti iti

original: “Puṇṇoti kho me, āvuso, nāmaṁ;
analyzed: puṇṇaḥ iti khalu me āvuso nāma

original: mantāṇiputtoti ca pana maṁ sabrahmacārī jānantī”ti.
analyzed: mantāṇiputto ti ca pana mama sabrahmacārī jānanti iti

original: “Acchariyaṁ, āvuso, abbhutaṁ, āvuso.
analyzed: acchariyaḥ āvuso abbhutaḥ āvuso

original: Yathā taṁ sutavatā sāvakena sammadeva satthusāsanaṁ ājānantena, evameva āyasmatā puṇṇena mantāṇiputtena gambhīrā gambhīrapañhā anumassa anumassa byākatā.
analyzed: yathā tam sutavatā sāvakena sammat eva satthu sāsanam ājānantena evam eva āyasmatā puṇṇena mantāṇi puttena gambhīrā gambhīra pañhā anumassa anumassa byākatā

original: Lābhā sabrahmacārīnaṁ, suladdhalābhā sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
analyzed: lābhā sabrahmacārīna su laddha lābhā sabrahmacārīna

original: ye āyasmantaṁ puṇṇaṁ mantāṇiputtaṁ labhanti dassanāya, labhanti payirūpāsanāya.
analyzed: ye āyasmantam puṇṇam mantāṇi puttam labhanti dassanāya labhanti payirūpāsanāya

original: Celaṇḍukena cepi sabrahmacārī āyasmantaṁ puṇṇaṁ mantāṇiputtaṁ muddhanā pariharantā
analyzed: celaṇḍukena cepi sabrahmacārī āyasmantam puṇṇam mantāṇiputtam muddhanā pariharantā

original: labheyyuṁ dassanāya, labheyyuṁ payirūpāsanāya, tesampi lābhā tesampi suladdhaṁ, amhākampi
analyzed: labheyyum dassanāya labheyyum payirūpāsanāya tesampi lābhā tesampi su laddha amhākampi

original: lābhā amhākampi suladdhaṁ, ye mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ puṇṇaṁ mantāṇiputtaṁ labhāma dassanāya,
analyzed: lābhāḥ amhākam pi ye mayam āyasmantam puṇṇam mantāṇi puttam labhāma dassanāya

original: labhāma payirūpāsanāyā”ti.
analyzed: labhāma payi rūpāsanāya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā puṇṇo mantāṇiputto āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā puṇṇaḥ mantāṇi puttaḥ āyasmantam sāriputtam etat avoca

original: “ko nāmo āyasmā, kathañca panāyasmantaṁ sabrahmacārī jānantī”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nāma āyasmā kathañca pana āyasmantam sabrahmacārī jānanti iti

original: “Upatissoti kho me, āvuso, nāmaṁ;
analyzed: upatissaḥ ti kho me āvuso nāma

original: sāriputtoti ca pana maṁ sabrahmacārī jānantī”ti.
analyzed: sāriputta iti ca pana mama sabrahmacārī jānanti iti

original: “Satthukappena vata kira, bho, sāvakena saddhiṁ mantayamānā na jānimha:
analyzed: satthu kappena vata kira bho sāvakena saddhim mantayamānāḥ na jānimha

original: ‘āyasmā sāriputto’ti.
analyzed: āyasmā sāriputto ti

original: Sace hi mayaṁ jāneyyāma ‘āyasmā sāriputto’ti, ettakampi no nappaṭibhāseyya.
analyzed: sace hi mayam jāneyyāma āyasmā sāriputto ti ettakam pi naḥ na paṭibhāseyya

original: Acchariyaṁ, āvuso, abbhutaṁ, āvuso.
analyzed: acchariyaḥ āvuso abbhutaḥ āvuso

original: Yathā taṁ sutavatā sāvakena sammadeva satthusāsanaṁ ājānantena, evameva āyasmatā sāriputtena gambhīrā gambhīrapañhā anumassa anumassa pucchitā.
analyzed: yathā tam sutavatā sāvakena sammat eva satthu sāsanam ājānantena evam eva āyasmatā sāriputtena gambhīrā gambhīra pañhā anumassa anumassa pucchitā

original: Lābhā sabrahmacārīnaṁ suladdhalābhā sabrahmacārīnaṁ,
analyzed: su laddha lābhā sabrahmacārīnam

original: ye āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ labhanti dassanāya, labhanti payirūpāsanāya.
analyzed: ye āyasmantam sāriputtam labhanti dassanāya labhanti payirūpāsanāya

original: Celaṇḍukena cepi sabrahmacārī āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ muddhanā pariharantā labheyyuṁ
analyzed: celaṇḍukena cepi sabrahmacārī āyasmantam sāriputtam muddhanā pariharantā labheyyu

original: dassanāya, labheyyuṁ payirūpāsanāya, tesampi lābhā tesampi suladdhaṁ, amhākampi lābhā
analyzed: dassanāya labheyyum payirūpāsanāya tesampi lābhā tesampi su laddha amhākampi lābhā

original: amhākampi suladdhaṁ, ye mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ labhāma dassanāya, labhāma payirūpāsanāyā”ti.
analyzed: amhākam pi ye mayam āyasmantam sāriputtam labhāma dassanāya labhāma payirūpāsanāya ati

original: Itiha te ubhopi mahānāgā aññamaññassa subhāsitaṁ samanumodiṁsūti.
analyzed: iti ha te ubho api mahā nāgāḥ aññamaññassa su bhāsitam samanumodisu iti

original: Rathavinītasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ catutthaṁ.
analyzed: rathavinīta suttam niṭṭhitam catuttha
